name: ZIP File Format, Version 6.2.0 (PKWARE)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">zip, ZIP</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: 2004 version of de facto industry standard for cross-platform data exchange used by OOXML (Office Open XML, ISO 29500, 2008-2012) and ODF (Open Document Format).
